a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Number of people with depressive disorders, by region

Estimated number of people who had
depressive disorders
, whether or not they are diagnosed, based on
representative surveys, medical data and statistical modelling.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
Note: Figures are affected by the size of the population in a country.
